div.bibl: Interest, Aug. 29, 1935. [CHICAGO CHAPTER OF CHI SIGMA GAMMA SORITY]

body.p: p.5....An organizing meeting for a Chicago Chapter of the Chi Sigma Gamma Sorority was held on Sunday, August 25th. It was under the leadership of Mrs. Charlotte Mika, sponsor of the Gary chapter. Those present were: Mrs. Charlotte Mika, Mrs. Frank Odar, Ann Heveder and Bertha Chomo of the Gary chapter and Frieda Frederick, Edith Hattala, and Virginia Wald of Chicago. The sorority is for high school graduates who are interested in furthering their knowledge of Hungarian culture. The next meeting will be held at Miss Wald's home, 721 Roscoe St., Thursday, Sept. 5th at 8:00 P.M.
